attributes.action: put in place for Autism and Asperger Syndrome to be introduced at schools, colleges, universities and the workplace(s)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many people out there who have got Autism and Asperger Syndrome who go into the community and they either need help and/or support and people have no idea what to do, people bully people with special needs and I, the creator of this group and many of my friends and family think Autism and Asperger Syndrome should be introduced at colleges and universities.

This would make community life and higher education easier for people with special needs.
